column1: The Xingu-Estreito HVDC transmission line is a 2076 km long 800 kV high-voltage direct current transmission line in Brazil between the Xingu substation at the city of Anapu in the Par√° state
column2: 17 km from the Belo Monte Dam
column3: and the Estreito substation at the city of Ibiraci in the Minas Gerais state. It was inaugurated 21 December 2017.
